item.title: A simple plot
item.description: This should produce a simple plot. plot(iris$Sepal.Length,iris$Petal.Length)

item.title: Testing the direct linkage between Netlify and GitHub
item.description: Let us create a bar graph. library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris,aes(Species))+geom_bar()

item.title: Yet another plot
item.description: This is a plot using the ggplot2 package. library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris,aes(Sepal.Length,Petal.Length,color=Species))+geom_point()

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: About
item.description: We are a group of folks from the Inland Northwest who work in different companies and universities in different roles. What binds us is our love for data analysis and the region.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Are you wondering how your data can be put to better use or are you wondering if there are any additional data that can be collected to make better decisions?
